title: yenakkum unakkum
sahitya:
enakkum unakkum ishainda poruttam enna poruttamO 

(enakkum)



anupallavi



inda poruttam ulagil pirarkku eidum poruttamo 

(enakkum)



caraNam 1



arashE unai aNaikka enakkuL Ashai pongudE aNaippOmennum

uNmaiyAl en Avi tangudE

viraishEr pAdam piDikka en kai viraindu nILudE mEvippiDittu

koLLumtOrum ulagaiyALUdE 

(enakkum)



caraNam 2



shinna vayadil ennaiyANDa tirattai ninaikkudE chintai ninaikka

kaNNIr perukki uDambai ninaikkudE

appA ninnai anri engum aNaippArum illaiyE andO ninnaiyanri

engum aruLvAr illaiyE 

(enakkum)



caraNam 3



EnnaiyANDa vaNNam eNNin ullam urugudE ennai vizhungi engum

inba veLLam perugudE

unnai unna manamum uyirum uDambum minukkudE unnODennai

vEreNNin mighavum paNikkudE 

(enakkum)



caraNam 4



un aruLai ninaikkum tOrum uDambu poDikkudE uNDu pashi

tIrTTArppOla kAdal mighavum taDikkudE

anbE amaiyumenra periyAr vArtai pOyiTrE anbOr aNuvum illA

enakku aruLayiTrE 

(enakkum)
